Text: Thanks! Good movie. I'm no expert at audio bitrates, just wondering why Amiable noted the high quality of the release this time but the audio is 192kbps.

Yall shd take a look at the bluray
http://www.blu-ray.com/movies/EXistenZ-and-Malevolent-and-B-Monkey-Blu-ray/38919/

Remember if BluRay has DTS then SCENE grps are forced to use DTS. If there was a better audio in the BluRay then amiable which is top notch scene group would have used it.
